measured_by: marker placement on a sliding confidence scale
justification: Participants "gave a combined decision and confidence rating by placing a marker on a sliding scale", so the subjective construct of decision confidence was operationalised through this slider rating.

measured_by: area under the Type II ROC curve (AUROC)
justification: The authors "constructed Type II ROC curves … [and] the area under these ROC curves (AUROC) reflects … metacognitive sensitivity", indicating AUROC is the metric used to measure this construct.

measured_by: absolute difference between participant and partner confidence ratings across phases
justification: Individual ‘confidence matching’ was computed by "the absolute difference between the participant's confidence and their partner's confidence … before interaction and during joint decision making," making this difference score the measure of the confidence-matching construct.
